mechanics.Flag: Must capture flag while holding bases.
mechanics.combat_policy: Objective Defensive. Do not chase off ledges.

Flag.name: Netherstorm Flag
Flag.interaction: Instant pick-up / 8.0s Cap Time at Base

combat.rule: Fight only to secure the Flag or Defend a Base.
combat.mid_field: Do not fight in the middle lanes unless escorting the Flag Carrier.
combat.chasing: FORBIDDEN. Do not chase kills. Reset to objective.

flag_play.policy: If you have 0 bases, DO NOT CAP FLAG (Points wasted). Wait for base cap.
flag_play.escort: Healers must follow FC. DPS must peel for FC.

Bases.strategy: Secure 2 home bases instantly. Defend them. Do not trade 2 bases for 1.

Flag.strategy: Grab -> Run -> Cap. If owning 2+ bases, run continuously.

strategy.name: 2-Base Hold + Flag Run
strategy.execution: 2 Defenders at MT, 2 at DR. 11 Push Mid for Flag. Cap Flag repeatedly.

strategy.name: 2-Base Hold + Flag Run
strategy.execution: 2 Defenders at BET, 2 at FR. 11 Push Mid for Flag. Cap Flag repeatedly.
